subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A week after he had the car to beat until an engine failure dropped him to a last-place finish, Denny Hamlin took the points lead for the first time in his career.
snippet: A week after he had the car to beat until an engine failure dropped him to a last-place finish, Denny Hamlin took the points lead for the first time in his career.
